name: Psych Seven
description:
Welcome to Psych Seven! An onflight of asteroids are approaching. It is your job to shoot them down and survive for seven minutes. Each asteroid will create smaller asteroids. Move with the arrow keys. Shoot with space bar. Pause with P. Reset with R. The red box you see is a safe zone. Once you're inside it, you can't shoot. You can shoot when you get out of it.

Good luck.

---

This is a game I've decided to create as resume fodder and as a learning tool. I planned it small in scope as a learning experiment - While I don't claim this game as particularly good, I'm satisfied with the knowledge I got and what it adds to my repertoire.

The soundtrack is available here: https://lucasguimaraes.bandcamp.com/album/psych-seven
